venue.name: Bella Luna Restaurant & Milky Way Lounge

item.description:
American Outlaw - A Country/Western Whiskey & Chili Showcase

Wednesday Feb 6 at 7:00 pm / $25
AMERICAN OUTLAW

A Country-Western Whiskey & Chili Shindig featuring live music from The Big City Ramblers!

3 Styles of homemade Chili w/ Cornbread
Whiskey showcase featuring 8 types of whiskey courtesy of Jack Daniels, Berkshire Mountain Distillers, & Ryan & Wood Distillery!

7PM / 25$ tickets include everything!
Advance Tickets @ http://AmericanOutlaw.Brownpapertickets.com or visit our homepage and scroll down!
item.name: Dance - All you can eat and Drink - American Outlaw night
